executable.title: List Folder Metadata
executable.description: Lists all metadata for folders inside a given parent folderId
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the DIVE project.

string.name: folderId
string.label: Parent Folder ID
string.description: The folder ID of the parent folder to list child folders and their metadata from

string.name: metadataRootId
string.label: Metadata Root ID
string.description: Optional: The metadata root folder ID to query metadata from. If not provided, will list folder information without metadata.

file.name: outputFile
file.label: Output File
file.description: Optional: Path to save the results JSON file. If not provided, results will be printed to stdout.

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Token
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client, automatically populated in DIVE
